message:
hi guys, 

this is our new app for the android platform, let me introduce Join to you all : 

Join is an app that lets you turn a group of Android devices into a complete network so you can share files and view them simultaneously with those around you in real time.
No need for WIFI hotspots, 3G or 4G networks when setting up a group. Join connects using only your Android device.
Current features:

- Sound sharing: You can create a sound sharing group and enjoy the synchronize surround sound over multiple Android devices. One device holds the sound file, all other devices act like an integrated speaker system.

- Photo sharing: Use Join to create a photo sharing group and enjoy watching your best moments with friends on all your screens

- Works on any type of smartphone or tablet. Join is a simple app, easy to use, and provides the best user experience on any Android device.

- No need for file transfers among your devices anymore, use Join to share what you want, when you want.

this is the first version of it .. we need your feedback and if you like it please share it ^_^ 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.join_team.join

our page
https://www.facebook.com/JoinApp

and you will find a video describing its features .. thanks in advance ^_^
story: Nour Kadry shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Join

data.message: thanks ^_^ .. we need more feedback guys :D
Join app looks promising .. Keep on the good work =)
